message: For all of you Democrats saying anything about carrying. The convention hall sets the policies for their place not the people who lease it.

Lee, did I not just show the verse that shows that God has not changed? The Old Testament is there to show how impossible it is to achieve perfection. In fact it's put in place so ppl like you will fail it's to show how hopeless we are. There is an old covenant and a new a old law and a new. There was no change now we have the blood of the only one able to fufil the humanly impossible law and covenant which is why we are no longer under the old law but grace. You say well it he changed then! Nope because those who refuse the blood of Christ will be judged according to the old law.
One day, this will all be yours!! What? The curtains?!?

But the Mets will find a way.. Mets in 7
